snippet: Prominent musicians offer their programming suggestions for the Colorado Symphony’s so-called Cannabis Concerts, which the city of Denver wants canceled.
abstract: Colorado Symphony is mulling whether it can go ahead with Classically Cannabis: The High Note Series, fundraiser sponsored by state's cannabis industry, after city of Denver questioned legality of event; several prominent conductors, composers and musicians offer suggestions for concert's musical offerings, assuming it is allowed to proceed.
lead_paragraph: Prominent musicians offer their programming suggestions for the Colorado Symphony’s so-called Cannabis Concerts, which the city of Denver wants canceled.

headline.seo: Proposing Selections for Colorado’s Cannabis Concerts
headline.main: Pass the Bong, and Tune Up the Berlioz
headline.print_headline: Pass the Bong, and Tune Up the Berlioz
